断水の羽田、トイレ手洗いはペットボトルの水…第２ターミナルは復旧メド立たず

07 Nov 2019, 02:30



水道が使えず、手洗い用のペットボトルが用意されたトイレの洗面台（東京都大田区の羽田空港第２ターミナルで）＝杉本昌大撮影

　羽田空港（東京都大田区）の国内線第１、第２ターミナルビルで６日に起きた断水は、７日午後１時現在、第２ターミナルビルで復旧のメドが立っていない。ビル内の一部の飲食店は営業を停止。トイレは使用できるが、手洗いはペットボトルの水で代用している。
　ビルに水を供給する「空港施設」（東京）によると、断水は６日午前９時頃、空港職員の「第２ターミナルの水から塩気を感じる」という連絡を受けて発生。同社は配管や貯水タンクなどの給水設備の清掃と水質検査を行っているが、原因は不明という。
　一方、第１ターミナルビルの断水は、水質検査の結果、問題がなかったため６日午後３時までに復旧した。
text:
Haneda with water outage, toilet hand-washing is water in plastic bottles ... Terminal 2 is not restored

07 Nov 2019, 02:30



Toilet sink with water bottles and hand-washed PET bottles (at Haneda Airport Terminal 2 in Ota-ku, Tokyo)

The water outage that occurred on the 6th in the 1st and 2nd Terminal Buildings at Haneda Airport (Ota-ku, Tokyo) has not been rehabilitated in the 2nd Terminal Building as of 1pm on the 7th. Some restaurants in the building are closed. Toilets can be used, but hand-washing is replaced with water from plastic bottles.
According to the “Airport Facility” (Tokyo), which supplies water to the building, the water outage occurred at around 9:00 am on the 6th, in response to a report from the airport staff saying “I feel salt from the water in Terminal 2”. The company cleans the water supply facilities such as pipes and water tanks, and checks the water quality, but the cause is unknown.
On the other hand, the water outage at Terminal 1 was restored by 3:00 pm on the 6th because there were no problems as a result of the water quality inspection.
